extension.description: Leave notes in your code without changing the source file. Supports Git, Smart Search and different display modes.
views.container.title: Ghost Comments
views.comments.name: Comments
configuration.title: Ghost Comments
configuration.sortOrder.desc: Comment Manager sorting: alphabetical ('alpha') or by modified date ('date').
configuration.displayMode.desc: Mode of display: 'right' (text at line end), 'left' (badge), or 'codelens' (above line).
configuration.filename.desc: Filename to store comments in the project root.
configuration.autoSyncOnSave.desc: Automatically update line numbers in JSON when file is saved. (Warning: affects git diff).
configuration.searchRange.desc: Number of lines to search up/down for moved code. 0 = search entire file.
configuration.maxFileSize.desc: Max size of the comments file (bytes).
configuration.maxCommentLength.desc: Max length of a single comment.
configuration.colors.errorColor.desc: Color for broken links (text in Right mode, border in Left mode).
